15 bool DataPreprocessor::filter_valid_domains(const std::string &input_filename, const std::string &output_filename) {
16 
17  int csv_columns[2] = {0, 1};
18  bool success = this->ptr_csv->csv2map(input_filename, csv_columns[0],csv_columns[1]);
19  Csv::map::iterator map_it;
20  bool is_downloadable = true;
21  int good_links = 0, all_links = 0; //counter of usable links
22  std::ofstream valid_domains_file;
23  valid_domains_file.open(output_filename);
24  if (!valid_domains_file.is_open()) //invalid file
25  {
26  return false;
27  } else {
28  for (map_it = ptr_csv->getId_url_map()->begin(); map_it != ptr_csv->getId_url_map()->end(); ++map_it) {
29  std::cout << map_it->first << " " << map_it->second << std::endl << std::flush;
30  all_links++;
31  std::string a;
32  is_downloadable = this->ptr_http->download(map_it->second, a);
33 
34  if (is_downloadable) {
35  valid_domains_file << map_it->first << ";" << map_it->second << "\n";
36  ++good_links;
37  }
38  }
39  valid_domains_file.close();
40  double prc = good_links / (double) all_links;
41  prc = prc * 100;
42 
43  std::cout << "All links: " << all_links << "\nGood links: " << good_links << "\nPercentage: " << prc << "%"
44  << std::endl << std::flush;
45  }
46  return success;
47 }

52 bool DataPreprocessor::parse_htmls(const std::string &filename,
53  const std::string &from_which_tags) {
54  //get html addresses from textfile to vector of string
55  string_vec addresses = ptr_http->get_lines_from_file(filename + ".txt");
56  std::string html_text, file_path;
57  std::string path_root(this->_curl_output_folder + "/");
58 
59  bool success = false;
60  boost::filesystem::create_directories(this->_curl_output_folder); //create a directory for results
61  int count = 0;
62  for (std::string i : addresses) {
63  html_text = "";
64  success = ptr_http->download(i, html_text); //for every link from file download the html code
65  if (!success) {
66  break;
67  }
68  file_path = path_root + "tmp.txt";
69  ptr_http->write_str_to_file(file_path, html_text);
70  std::string line, line1;
71  std::ifstream ifs(file_path);
72  html_text = "";
73  file_path = path_root + std::to_string(this->fileCounter) + ".txt";
74  while (!ifs.eof()) {
75  getline(ifs, line);
76 
77  while (line.back() != '>') {
78  if (!ifs.eof()) {
79  getline(ifs, line1);
80  line += line1;
81  } else {
82  break;//TODO cos tu sie zapetla, trzeba naprawic
83  }
84  }
85  html_text += line;
86  html_text += '\n';
87  }
88 
89  std::string output_of_parsing(filename + "\n");
90  output_of_parsing.erase(0,11); //erase train_data
91  std::set<std::string> map_of_attribs;
92  atrybuty += ptr_http->parse_html_and_save(html_text, from_which_tags,
93  output_of_parsing,
94  map_of_attribs); //parse html_text and save to file in /output directory text from "html/body" node, that means only the text between <body></body>
95  all_atribs.insert(map_of_attribs.begin(), map_of_attribs.end());
96  ptr_http->write_str_to_file(file_path, output_of_parsing); //write to file parsed html
97 
98  this->fileCounter++;
99  count++;
100  if(count>20){
101  break;
102  }
103  }
104 
105 // ptr_http->write_set_to_file(path_root + filename+"_all_attrib.txt", all_atribs, filename);
106  std::cout << "Ilosc wszystkich atrybutow: " << all_atribs.size() << std::endl;
107  return success;
108 }

119 void DataPreprocessor::choose_train_data(const std::string &inFilename) {
120 
121  std::ifstream file(inFilename + ".txt");
122  int lineCount = 0;
123  std::string line, category(inFilename);
124 
125  boost::filesystem::create_directories("train_data");
126  boost::filesystem::create_directories("test_data");
127 
128 
129  std::string to_remove = "categories/";
130  std::string::size_type i = category.find(to_remove); //don't want direcotry name as a category name
131 
132  if (i != std::string::npos)
133  category.erase(i, to_remove.length());
134 
135 
136  std::string trainFilename("train_data/"+category + ".txt");
137  std::string testFilename("test_data/" +category + ".txt");
138  std::string train, test;
139  while (getline(file, line)) {
140  if (lineCount % 4) {
141  train += line;
142  train += "\n";
143  } else {
144  test += line;
145  test += "\n";
146  }
147  lineCount++;
148  }
149 
150  ptr_http->write_str_to_file(trainFilename, train);
151  ptr_http->write_str_to_file(testFilename, test);
152 }

158 bool DataPreprocessor::get_attribs_from_link(const std::string &url) {
159  std::string html_text, file_path;
160  std::string path_root("example/");
161  std::string from_which_tags("/html/body/div[@id='content']/div[@id='bodyContent']/div[@id='mw-content-text']/p");
162  bool success = false;
163  boost::filesystem::create_directories("example"); //create a directory for results
164  html_text = "";
165  success = ptr_http->download(url, html_text); //for every link from file download the html code
166  if (!success) {
167  return false;
168  }
169  file_path = path_root + "tmp.txt";
170  ptr_http->write_str_to_file(file_path, html_text);
171  std::string line, line1;
172  std::ifstream ifs(file_path);
173  html_text = "";
174  file_path = path_root + "attribs.txt";
175  while (!ifs.eof()) {
176  getline(ifs, line);
177 
178  while (line.back() != '>') {
179  if (!ifs.eof()) {
180  getline(ifs, line1);
181  line += line1;
182  } else {
183  break;
184  }
185  }
186  html_text += line;
187  html_text += '\n';
188  }
189 
190  std::string output_of_parsing;
191  // output_of_parsing.erase(0,11); //erase train_data
192  std::set<std::string> map_of_attribs;
193  /*atrybuty += */ptr_http->parse_html_and_save(html_text, from_which_tags,
194  output_of_parsing,
195  map_of_attribs); //parse html_text and save to file in /output directory text from "html/body" node, that means only the text between <body></body>
196  //all_atribs.insert(map_of_attribs.begin(), map_of_attribs.end());
197  ptr_http->write_str_to_file(file_path, output_of_parsing); //write to file parsed html
198  return success;
199 }
